page.title: 03THE WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: The W I was founded in 1920 and meets on the 2nd Tuesday of each month in the Social Institute. The meetings start with business (last months minutes, letters and future events) followed by a guest speaker, the subjects varying from cookery, craft, travel and professional work talks, the evening finishes with tea or coffee and a chance to chat. We are also a member of the Willow Group of local Institutes which gives us an opportunity to meet our neighbours and friends from nearby villages (Lambley, Oxton, Woodborough, Calverton and Woodthorpe). We run a monthly Chiropody Clinic which is open to everyone.
